title: CrowdStrike Falcon Platform Umbrella Chart Values Schema
description: Schema for the falcon-platform umbrella chart configuration

createComponentNamespaces.description: Enable automatic namespace creation - pre-install only

global.description: Global configuration shared across all Falcon components

cid.description: Falcon Customer ID (CID) - required for all components

falconSecret.description: Global Falcon Secret configuration for existing Kubernetes secret

enabled.description: Enable a Kubernetes secret to inject sensitive Falcon values

secretName.description: Name of existing Kubernetes secret containing sensitive Falcon values

docker.description: Global docker registry configuration for pulling Falcon component images

pullSecret.description: Existing docker registry Kubernetes secret for accessing private registries

registryConfigJSON.description: Base64 encoded docker registry config json for accessing private registries
